skill.name: arxiv-search
skill.description: Search arXiv preprint repository for papers in physics, mathematics, computer science, quantitative biology, and related fields
skill.summary: Search arXiv preprint repository for papers in physics, mathematics, computer science, quantitative ...
skill.author: langchain-ai

security_audit.summary: This skill is a legitimate research tool that queries the official arXiv API using the standard arxiv Python package. It has network access limited to arxiv.org for fetching research paper metadata. No file system access, no external commands, no environment variable reading. Low risk due to network capability for a clearly documented API integration.

content.value_statement: Finding academic papers across physics, mathematics, computer science, and quantitative biology can be time-consuming. This skill provides direct access to the arXiv preprint repository to search and retrieve paper titles and abstracts instantly.
actual_capabilities: Search arXiv by keyword or topic
Access computer science, physics, and biology papers
No authentication required for arXiv API
limitations: Returns only paper titles and summaries (not full PDFs)
Limited to arXiv database only (no other academic sources)
No citation generation or reference checking

use_cases.title: Literature review
use_cases.description: Quickly find recent preprints on specific research topics before journal publication

use_cases.title: ML paper discovery
use_cases.description: Search for machine learning papers in cs.LG and stat.ML categories

use_cases.title: Academic research
use_cases.description: Access free scholarly articles for coursework and thesis research

prompt_templates.title: With limit
prompt_templates.prompt: Search arxiv for {topic} papers, return maximum of {n} results

prompt_templates.title: Category focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Search arxiv for papers about {topic} in computer science or machine learning

prompt_templates.title: Deep research
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the most relevant arxiv papers on {topic}, give me {n} results with full summaries

best_practices: Use specific search terms for more relevant results
Combine multiple keywords for precise queries
Check paper submission dates for recent research
anti_patterns: Searching for very broad terms like 'science' or 'computer'
Expecting full-text content (only abstracts are returned)
Relying solely on arXiv without checking peer-reviewed journals

faq.question: Is arXiv free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, arXiv is free and open access. No API key or authentication is required.

faq.question: What topics can I search?
faq.answer: Physics, mathematics, computer science, quantitative biology, finance, statistics, and electrical engineering.

faq.question: How many results can I get?
faq.answer: Default is 10 papers. Use --max-papers flag to adjust the limit up or down.

faq.question: Does this download full papers?
faq.answer: No, this skill returns titles and abstracts only. Use arXiv links to access full PDFs.

faq.question: Why no results found?
faq.answer: Try different keywords. Some topics may not have preprints on arXiv. Check spelling of terms.

faq.question: How is this different from Google Scholar?
faq.answer: ArXiv focuses on preprints in STEM fields. Google Scholar covers all academic sources including peer-reviewed journals.
